title: Iron Man Game From EA and Marvel Announced! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.20.22
description:
A new Iron Man has been announced! Greg and special guest Niki Grayson talk about what we can expect from EA and Marvel, Shawn Layden joining Tencent, and Portal being remastered!  

Follow Niki: https://twitter.com/godsewa

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:43 - Housekeeping

PS I Love You XOXO is recording tomorrow and it’s our God of War (2018) re-review! Go over to Patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames to get your write-ins read on the show. Then that episode will go up for everyone on Thursday.

Do you like Bless Who, Kinda Funny Gamescast’s Trivia Post Show? Well the poll is back open for the fan favorite game Kinda Feudy! Go over on Blessing’s twitter, find the tweet and fill out the prompts to help shape the answers on the show. https://twitter.com/BlessingJr/status/1571925122344452097


Week 2 of the KFFL is up on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyPlays!

The Roper Report  -

00:08:00 - Marvel and EA announce a new Iron Man game
00:10:52 - Niki Pitches Themselves
00:16:30 - Former PlayStation Exec Shawn Layden Joins Tencent
00:23:13 - The FBI is Investigating Alleged Rockstar Hacker
00:28:41 - Ad
00:30:48 - Nvidia Officially Announces the RTX 4090 and 4080 Desktop GPUs
00:34:09 - Nvidia also announces a Portal RTX Remaster with Ray Tracing
00:37:21 - The first US video game studio to unionize is shutting down
00:43:50 - Gaming ‘Insider’ Leaker Exposed As Just A YouTuber Breaking Embargoes And NDAs
00:50:03 - Former Suicide Squad Game Writer Turns Down Award Over Sexual Harassment Allegations
00:56:21 - Atlus Confirms No New Game Announcements Planned for Persona Super Live 2022 Concert
00:59:14 - Out today
01:05:31 - Squad Up: Nathan Choquette - Pokemon GO - 3625 2673 5483
01:06:17 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Jennifer Locke
